Name: Slovenian parliamentary corpus siParl 4.0
Description: The corpus contains Slovenian parliamentary debates from 1990 to 2022. The corpus is encoded according to the Parla-CLARIN schema. In terms of linguistic annotation, the part-of-speech tags, morphological analyses, and syntactic parses in the corpus follow the Universal Dependencies schema. The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository and through the noSketch Engine concordancer.
